vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὀν-ῐκός, ή, όν,
of or for an ass: μύλος ὀ., see at {μύλος}; ὀ. κτήνη, i. e. asses, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; γόμος ὀ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: pertaining to a donkey, millstone worked by a donkey
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
pertaining to a donkey, millstone worked by a donkey
pertaining to a donkey;, μύλος ὀνικός, a millstone turned by a donkey, a large or an upper millstone, Mt. 18:6; Mk. 9:42*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: piedra de molino, ºde un burro, asno
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
與驢子相關的
在新約聖經與其他字合用,表示用驢推動的磨 (太 18:6; 路 17:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
与驴子相关的
在新约圣经与其他字合用,表示用驴推动的磨 (太 18:6; 路 17:2)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cối đá lớn do lừa kéo bằng lừa
